comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: The Governor's daughter Olive Whitman named the Naval Militia's hydroaeroplane. See article in The New York Times, November 2, 1915 "NAMES FLYING BOAT FOR NAVAL MILITIA"

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: B-59: Thanks for the information about Olive Whitman who is seated in the front row here. We will add more information to the description.
